about:
I am Hanfia Jahangir, a Senior Unity Game Developer with over 6 years of experience crafting immersive and high-performance gaming experiences. My expertise spans Unity3D, multiplayer game architecture enabling seamless real-time multiplayer systems.

I have a keen eye for **user experience** and **game design**, focusing on delivering intuitive, engaging, and immersive player interactions. With extensive experience in **cross-platform development**, I have successfully developed games for both **Android and iOS** using Unity, ensuring a consistent experience across devices.

I thrive in collaborative environments where I lead teams and projects from concept to launch. When not developing games, I enjoy sketching and exploring new technology to push my skills further.

My goal is to deliver exceptional digital experiences that captivate and inspire players. Letâ€™s build the future of gaming together.
